item.title: Dear Jane, regarding Mr. Bennet
item.description: Chapter One It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.

item.title: Oh, Alice
item.description: Nor did such soothing scenes, however temporary, fail of at least as temporary an effect on Ahab.
